name: Find Nearby Businesses
description: Finds nearby businesses based on a user's query using Google Places API. Supports detailed information, reviews, and various search parameters.
author: @assistant

input.hint: Enter your Google Places API Key

examples.prompt: Find coffee shops in downtown Seattle
What are some good Italian restaurants near Times Square, New York?
examples.call: {"query": "Italian restaurants near Times Square, New York"}

examples.prompt: Show me the top-rated bars within 2 km of my current location
What are the operating hours of the Eiffel Tower?
Find pharmacies open now in Chicago
Show me reviews for the Museum of Modern Art in New York
What are some popular tourist attractions in London?

query.description: The user's query for finding nearby businesses

location.description: The location to search around (e.g., 'current' for user's location)

radius.description: The radius (in meters) to search within

details.description: Array of additional details to fetch (e.g., ['operating_hours', 'reviews'])

open_now.description: Whether to only show places open now

type.description: The type of place to search for (e.g., 'restaurant', 'museum')
